title: Gentleman Cho'Gath Unique Feast Sound Disabled
body: It only plays the base skin sound for his ultimate, rather than the more sophisticated and gentlemanly skin-unique Feast sound. All other sounds work as intended in my experience.

replies.body:
Hey YoshixZeFabulous - 

Thanks for the report! We'll see what's going on here. :)

**EDIT**: Should be fixed in 6.8, if all goes as planned!
